Neon Samples

Neon samples.

- 99-bottles

Print the lyrics to the "99 Bottles of Beer" song

- bbs

Simple multiuser BBS

- cal

Print monthly and yearly calendars

- editor

Simple text editor for Neon source files

- fizzbuzz

Implementation of the FizzBuzz problem

- flappy

Implementation of a "Flappy Bird" clone (SDL)

- forth

Implementation of the Forth programming language

- hello

Hello World

- httpd

HTTP server

- life

Conway's Game of Life (SDL)

- lisp

Implementation of a Scheme-like Lisp dialect

- mandelbrot

Mandelbrot set generator (SDL)

- net-services

Simple network services (daytime, discard, echo)

- othello

Othello game (curses)

- quine

Example quine (program that prints its own source code)

- sieve

Sieve of Eratosthenes

- snake

Snake game (curses)

- spacedebris

Vector based space rocks game (SDL)

- sudoku

Sudoku game (curses)

- tetris

Tetris game (curses)
